mapper.select: SELECT id, email, password, first_name, last_name, address1, address2, city, state, postal_code, phone_number FROM account
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO account (email, password, first_name, last_name, address1, address2, city, state, postal_code, phone_number) VALUES (#{email}, #{password}, #{firstName}, #{lastName}, #{address.address1}, #{address.address2}, #{address.city}, #{address.state}, #{address.postalCode}, #{phoneNumber})
mapper.update: UPDATE account SET email = #{email}, first_name = #{firstName}, last_name = #{lastName}, address1 = #{address.address1}, address2 = #{address.address2}, city = #{address.city}, state = #{address.state}, postal_code = #{address.postalCode}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber} WHERE id = #{id}
